description: This file defines a React functional component 'AuthGate' that acts as a role-based access control gate for rendering UI content based on user authentication and roles.

methods.name: AuthGate({ roles = [], fallback = null, children })
methods.description: React functional component that renders children if user is authenticated and has the required role(s), otherwise renders fallback.

ctags.name: AuthGate
ctags.pattern: /^export default function AuthGate({ roles = [], fallback = null, children }) {$/
